name: ListGithubRepoCollaborators
description:
Retrieve collaborators of a GitHub repository.

Use this tool to get the list of collaborators for a GitHub repository, including organization members and outside collaborators. Useful for understanding who has access and their roles. Requires specific authentication permissions.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the GitHub repository. This name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository. It is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

Filter collaborators returned by their affiliation. `outside` means all outside collaborators of an organization-owned repository. `direct` means all collaborators with permissions to an organization-owned repository, regardless of organization membership status. `all` means all collaborators the authenticated user can see.

parameters.name: filter_by_permission
parameters.description: Specify the permission level ('pull', 'triage', 'push', 'maintain', 'admin') to filter the repository collaborators. Returns all collaborators if not specified.

value_schema.description: Filter collaborators by the permissions they have on the repository. If not specified, all collaborators will be returned.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page to return, with a maximum of 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: results_page_number
parameters.description: The page number of results to retrieve when querying the list of collaborators.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.
